author: drac970815
content: Hello all, I'm just new here. I recently found this token called CHZ while I was browsing in CMC. As I can see this is related to sports and I found that they are currently had 100+ partners from different sports worldwide. Mostly they have soccer(football) partners. I saw a Twitter post also that they're scheduled 2.0 for mainnet later this year also. But I didn't find yet any user case for chiliz.So I would really appreciate it to have some advice from senior members about this project. Because the FIFA world cup coming later in November. So can we expect price movement from chiliz? because there most partners are from soccer.
